/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Vehicles of various types, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
